name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: Feast & Famine: Creating The Food For The Hunger Games
detailed_description: An inside look at the creation of the Capitol cuisine as seen in the Hunger Games.
about_the_game: An inside look at the creation of the Capitol cuisine as seen in the Hunger Games.
